## viewport() function

Create a viewport component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function viewport(options?: ViewportBuilderOptions): ComponentBuilder<ViewportModel>;
```

**Returns:**

[ComponentBuilder](./dsl.componentbuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;[ViewportModel](./viewport.viewportmodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A `ComponentBuilder` ready to use with `AppBuilder.component`

## Remarks

Creates a `ComponentBuilder` wrapping the `@boba-cli/viewport` package. The viewport provides a scrollable window onto text content with keyboard and mouse wheel navigation support.

## Example 1

Basic usage:

```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('logs', viewport({
    width: 80,
    height: 20,
    content: 'Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3'
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => components.logs)
  .build()
```

## Example 2

With custom styling:

```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('output', viewport({
    width: 100,
    height: 30,
    content: generateLongContent(),
    style: new Style().foreground('#8be9fd'),
    mouseWheelEnabled: true
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => vstack(
    text('Scrollable Output:'),
    components.output
  ))
  .build()
```

## Example 3

High performance mode for large content:

```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('largeLog', viewport({
    width: 120,
    height: 40,
    content: fs.readFileSync('large-log.txt', 'utf-8'),
    highPerformanceRendering: true
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => components.largeLog)
  .build()
```
